A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (SPOILERS. AHEAD) i don't get the negative reviews at all. it's different from the other star wars films because it was bold. rey's parentage reveal was great because it shows that people.dont have to come from powerful. bloodlines to be capable of power as well. it's a strong message. and people keep wanting kylo ren to be the villain when i personally think of him as just a character. the dude is struggling because of the light in him. he is not your Big Bad no matter how he tries to be. my favorite storyline. to be honest. and luke? that was a great twist! the movie highlighted the fact that it's never black and white and even your favorite jedi can have moments of weakness. it's a bold move for sure but i for one am glad rian johnson was ballsy enough to do it. aside from these\, the movie was really emotional and funny and. it's definitely one of my favorites!
